title: My league fps has issues please help
body:
My league was runing at 31 fps (witch is bad) i always wanted to know how to improve them but now i upgraded to windows 10 and had to reinstall league and now my game is runing at 5 fps witch is super unplayable my specs are :
proccessor: amd e1 1500 apu with radeon(tm) HD Graphics  1.48GH
Ram: 6.00 (4.96 GB usable)
System type: 64 bit operating system, x64 based processor
 please help me , and it says my graphic card is a amd HD radeon 7310 before i updated now it says windows basic display adapter.. did this update take down my fps and can it be fixed? ive tried deleting config aswell as turning down my in game settings , turning off eye candy etc. its not workin, then i also turned on display for best use...... PLEASE HELP ME I DONT KNOW WHAT I WILL DO WITHOUT LEAGUE, IM OPEN TO ANY SUGGESTIONS

replies.body:
Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.

http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/images/news/Skins/Tristana_RocketGirl_Splash.jpg

Since FPS issues are often caused by drivers or installation issues, this is a good starting point. Should you still see problems, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)

Just as a heads up, your PC doesn't meet the [minimum requirements](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1) to run League, so while we can suggest steps to take, they may not resolve the issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.

If I may bother you for a moment here, but what is the maximum supported resolution in this game?

What I am specifically curious about, as I am receiving my new GPU shortly - [Nvidia GTX 1080 Strix](http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814126103) - and plan to do some testing of this card compared to my GTX 780 (or current GTX 670, as the GTX 780 bought the farm and which the GTX 1080 will replace), I am going to connect my second 24", 1920x1200 16:10 monitor and try to run this game in an extended desktop mode.

So my effective resolution will be 3840x1200, and here's my question: does this game support the resolution of 3840x1200, and will it affect my ingame FOV (Field Of View)?

And what kind of FPS can I expect to see in this game with the GTX 1080? 

By comparison, I was at a steady ~250FPS (minimum) in full-on teamfights with the GTX 780. And at my resolution, the GTX 1080 is generally listed to be effectively ~115% better at 1920x1200. 
I know I won't be able to register anything above ~110 FPS anyway, but...humour me, please. :)
